content.text: Match ends, Crystal Palace 1, Southampton 0.
Second Half ends, Crystal Palace 1, Southampton 0.
Attempt missed. Shane Long (Southampton) header from the right side of the six yard box misses to the left. Assisted by Dusan Tadic with a cross following a corner.
